So I bookmarked a post but I can't figure out if bookmarks are stored someplace that I can then go back and access? Anyone know how to do that?

ondreian
Tuesday, August 8th, 2017, 6:00:25 PM

you can go to user/<username>/bookmarks to see your bookmarks. Or navigate there by going to your profile (at the top > more > bookmarks
